languages.text: "Запрос о сотрудничестве рассмотрен и отклонен. Несмотря на высокий статус, представители династии фон Валанциус принадлежат к //мирскому//несведущему//технопрофанному// сословию, не уполномоченному вмешиваться во внутренние разбирательства Адептус Механикус".

"Cooperation request reviewed and denied. Despite their high standing, members and representatives of House von Valancius are part of the //lay//uninformed//tech-unversed// stratum that is unauthorised to interfere in the internal investigative proceedings of the Adeptus Mechanicus."
languages.original_text: "Запрос о сотрудничестве рассмотрен и отклонен. Несмотря на высокий статус, представители династии фон Валанциус принадлежат к //мирскому//несведущему//технопрофанному// сословию, не уполномоченному вмешиваться во внутренние разбирательства Адептус Механикус".

traits.locale_text: "Cooperation request reviewed and declined. Despite their high standing, members and representatives of House von Valancius are part of the //lay//uninformed//tech-unversed// stratum that is unauthorised to interfere in the internal investigative proceedings of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

languages.text: 「協力要請の検討および却下。その地位の高さにもかかわらず、フォン・ヴァランシウス家のメンバーおよび代表者は、帝国技術局の調査手順に干渉する権限を与えられていない//俗人//無知//技術無知//階層に属している」
languages.original_text: "Cooperation request reviewed and denied. Despite their high standing, members and representatives of House von Valancius are part of the //lay//uninformed//tech-unversed// stratum that is unauthorised to interfere in the internal investigative proceedings of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: 「協力要請の検討および却下。その地位の高さにもかかわらず、フォン・ヴァランシウス家のメンバーおよび代表者は、帝国技術局の調査手順に干渉する権限を与えられていない//俗人//無知//技術無知//階層に属している」
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: “合作请求已审核，请求已拒绝。尽管冯·瓦兰修斯家族代表与家族成员拥有尊崇地位，但仍属于//教外人士//非知情人士//非技术人士//阶层，无权干涉机械修会的内部调查程序。”
languages.original_text: "Cooperation request reviewed and denied. Despite their high standing, members and representatives of House von Valancius are part of the //lay//uninformed//tech-unversed// stratum that is unauthorised to interfere in the internal investigative proceedings of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: “合作请求已审核，请求已拒绝。尽管冯·瓦兰修斯家族代表与家族成员拥有尊崇地位，但仍属于//教外人士//非知情人士//非技术人士//阶层，无权干涉机械修会的内部调查程序。”
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: "Kooperationsanfrage geprüft und abgewiesen. Trotz ihres hohen Status sind Mitglieder und Vertreter des Hauses von Valancius //Laien//uninformiert//nicht tech-bewandert// und demnach nicht autorisiert, an internen Untersuchungen des Adeptus Mechanicus teilzuhaben."
languages.original_text: "Cooperation request reviewed and denied. Despite their high standing, members and representatives of House von Valancius are part of the //lay//uninformed//tech-unversed// stratum that is unauthorised to interfere in the internal investigative proceedings of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: "Kooperationsanfrage geprüft und abgewiesen. Trotz ihres hohen Status sind Mitglieder und Vertreter des Hauses von Valancius //Laien//uninformiert//nicht tech-bewandert// und demnach nicht autorisiert, an internen Untersuchungen des Adeptus Mechanicus teilzuhaben."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: « Demande de coopération examinée et refusée. Malgré leur statut, les membres et représentants de la maison von Valancius font partie de la caste des //profanes//non-initiés//techno-incultes// et en tant que tels, ils n'ont pas le droit d'interférer dans le processus d'enquête interne de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. »
languages.original_text: "Cooperation request reviewed and denied. Despite their high standing, members and representatives of House von Valancius are part of the //lay//uninformed//tech-unversed// stratum that is unauthorised to interfere in the internal investigative proceedings of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: « Demande de coopération examinée et rejetée. Malgré leur statut, les membres et représentants de la maison von Valancius font partie de la caste des //profanes//non-initiés//techno-incultes// et en tant que tels, ils n'ont pas le droit d'interférer dans le processus d'enquête interne de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. »
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: «Solicitud de cooperación revisada y denegada. Pese a su eminente posición, los miembros y representantes de la casa von Valancius pertenecen al estrato //seglar//desinformado//tecnolego// de la sociedad, y por tanto carecen de autorización para interferir en los procedimientos de investigación interna del Adeptus Mechanicus».
languages.original_text: "Cooperation request reviewed and denied. Despite their high standing, members and representatives of House von Valancius are part of the //lay//uninformed//tech-unversed// stratum that is unauthorised to interfere in the internal investigative proceedings of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: «Solicitud de cooperación revisada y rechazada. Pese a su eminente posición, los miembros y representantes de la casa von Valancius pertenecen al estrato //seglar//desinformado//tecnolego// de la sociedad, y por tanto carecen de autorización para interferir en los procedimientos de investigación interna del Adeptus Mechanicus».
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: "İş birliği talebi incelenip reddedildi. Yüksek statülerine rağmen von Valancius Hanesi mensupları ve temsilcileri, Adeptus Mechanicus'un dâhili inceleme süreçlerine katılım sağlama iznine sahip olmayan //avam//bilgisiz//teknoloji konusunda deneyimsiz// tabakadandır."
languages.original_text: "Cooperation request reviewed and denied. Despite their high standing, members and representatives of House von Valancius are part of the //lay//uninformed//tech-unversed// stratum that is unauthorised to interfere in the internal investigative proceedings of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: "İş birliği talebi incelendi ve reddedildi. Yüksek statülerine rağmen von Valancius Hanesi'nin üyeleri ve temsilcileri, Adeptus Mechanicus'un dâhili inceleme süreçlerine katılım sağlama iznine sahip olmayan //avam//bilgisiz//teknoloji konusunda deneyimsiz// tabakalardandırlar."
traits.speaker: Opticon22
